name: Connect 9
description:
Connect 9 is a simple, fun and addictive number puzzle game. Match three or more adjacent squares of the same number to get a higher number. The goal is to get the highest score by making smart connections that will prevent the board from filling up.

Features

  • Free to play with hours of number fun
  • Play online/offline in a multiplayer match
  • Leaderboard to compete with players around the world
  • 16 Google Play Service Achievements
  • Automatically saves your game
